title: Academia
text:
Below are links to my various published papers and their related github pages.
Many of my papers come from having been a contributor of the COVID-19 Genomics UK Consortium at The University of Liverpool (source).

title: Academia
text:
2024

Optimised human stool sample collection for multi-omic microbiota analysis
Link: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-024-67499-4
R Code Bookdown: https://m-gemmell.github.io/Gemmell_et_al_2023/01-Intro.html

title: Academia
text:
2023

Investigation of hospital discharge cases and SARS-CoV-2 introduction into Lothian care homes
Link: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0195670123000671


The Hypolimnas misippus genome supports a common origin of the W chromosome in Lepidoptera

The ecology of viruses in urban rodents with a focus on SARS-CoV-2
Link: https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/22221751.2023.2217940

title: Academia
text:
2021

Evaluating the Effects of SARS-CoV-2 Spike Mutation D614G on Transmissibility and Pathogenicity

Recurrent emergence of SARS-CoV-2 spike deletion H69/V70 and its role in the Alpha variant B.1.1.7

Changes in symptomatology, reinfection, and transmissibility associated with the SARS-CoV-2 variant B.1.1.7: an ecological study

Amplicon and Metagenomic Analysis of Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) Coronavirus and the Microbiome in Patients with Severe MERS
Link: https://journals.asm.org/doi/full/10.1128/msphere.00219-21

title: Education
text: Below are links to my various education websites.

title: Education
text:
R for Everyone



A course book that aims to each the fundamentals of R which is intended for beginners.
Link: https://m-gemmell.github.io/R_for_everyone/

title: Education
text:
Time over motivation



Slides about the Comparison of the engagement and completion of synchronous and asynchronous online courses for adult learners.
Link: https://m-gemmell.github.io/PGCAP/MG_PGCAP.html
YouTube link of recorded talk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=068Wx19OjxM&t=1s

title: Academia
text: Below are links to guides I create for myself and others to use.

title: Academia
text:
MG Bookdown guide



 A quick and dirty guide on how I use bookdown. It is primarily for my use but if someone else finds it I hope it will also proof useful. Additionally, this was made with R Bookdown.
Link: https://m-gemmell.github.io/Bookdown_guide/01-MG_Bookdown_guide.html

title: Hobbies
text: Websites realted to my hobbies. These are primarily related to role playing games.

title: Hobbies
text:
Primeval Deities



 A website to host faction information of the Primeval deities for the FIST RPG. Contains missions, lore, and a “bestiary”.
Link: https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/

title: Hobbies
text:
The Aurora’s Avarice



 A Mystery for the RPG Monster of the Week. It includes a skiing mouintain town on the off season, a cult, and giant Ice worms.
Link: https://m-gemmell.github.io/RPGs/Monster_of_the_week/The_auroras_avarice/01-The_auroras_avarice.html

title: Overview
text:
Hello, I’m M Gemmell. This website acts as a landing page for my various interests.

title: Hobbies
text:
THE BEAD



 A trans-dimensional expansion to the Primeval Deities setting for the FIST RPG. Contains different settings for your trans-dimensional travels.
Link: https://m-gemmell.github.io/BEAD/
